data: Go to umass r/umass • ivyluvr Can an Amherst College student join a research lab/group at UMass Amherst? Hi! I'm an Amherst College student currently exploring research opportunities in biostatistics, epidemiology and public health. Unfortunately, there aren’t many professors at Amherst who focus on these areas. Most of the research here is centered around pure math and geometry which, at the moment, are stuff I’m not yet interested in. That said, is it possible for Amherst students to join a research lab or work with a professor at UMass Amherst through the consortium? Thanks in advance! Read more Share
